attributes.action: Hold a Public Enquiry now into the government’s Covid-19 virus response
attributes.additional_details: Tens of thousands of people have died in the first and second waves of this pandemic. It is essential that the government can identify and publish the lessons learned as soon as possible, and include them in a plan to keep people  in Britain safer in future. The plan would reference possible  third and fourth waves of this Covid pandemic and any future event.
attributes.background: Publish lessons learned from the outbreak and include them in future pandemic planning
